txt.en: You have done much to hinder the Orcs and their vile allies at Rung-shakam.\n\nYou should raise a banner of the Haban'akkâ of Thráin at Rung-shakam.
Defeated Orcs and goblins at Rung-shakam ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Orcs, goblins, trolls, and Orkish drums can be found at Rung-shakam.\n\nKing Thráin has commanded you to join in the assault at Rung-shakam. You should aid the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.
The Haban'akkâ of Thráin will be victorious!
Upon the slopes of Zirakzigil at Rung-shakam, the trolls and goblins of Moria work together to rain great stones upon the Haban'akkâ of Thráin at Azanulbizar.
Raise a banner of the Haban’akkâ of Thráin at Rung-shakam

'The Haban'akkâ has need of your aid, my friend.

'I have received word that our enemies at Rung-shakam again seek to rain boulders on our warriors from above the East-gate. I have no doubt more Orcs with capable enough hands have begun to sound the war-drums once more, but they and their crude instruments must be silenced!

'Let our enemies at Rung-shakam know the wrath of the Haban'akkâ!'
Defeat Orcs and goblins at Rung-shakam ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
